ai_twibbon.overview_desc: AI Twibbon allows you to creatively transform your image into any style. Our AI analyzes your face and blends it with your chosen reference image. You can then turn your design into a campaign that others can replicate!
ai_twibbon.how_it_works_desc: Upload a portrait with your face clearly visible, then add a reference photo that matches the style you want. Pro tip: For optimal results, use reference images that closely resemble your photo, such as those featuring a hat or head covering.
ai_twibbon.guideline_desc: AI Twibbon image generation may produce unexpected results. To get the best results, use clear selfie in high-resolution. They work best when they are at least 1000 pixels wide. Our system may not create an image if it finds any NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content.
